Liel Abada (Hibru: ליאל עבדה, /lɪˈɛl/ li-EL; amụrụ (2001-10-03)3 Ọktoba 2001) bụ onye Israel bụ ọkachamara n'igba bọọlụ nke na-agba dị ka onye na-agba n'ihu maka Scottish Premiership club Celtic na otu bọọlụ nke mba Israel.

A mụrụ Abada na Petah Tikva, Israel, n'ezinụlọ Mizrahi nke ndị Juu. Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, onye njikwa mbụ ya na Maccabi Petah Tikva kpọọrọ nna Abada Ronen na ya mee emume Bar Mitzvah ya na Barcelona. Nwanne ya nwoke nke obere Orel Abada bụkwa onye na-agba bọọlụ na Maccabi Petah Tikva. Abada na-eme ihe ma ọ naghị agba bọọlụ n'oge ezumike ndị Juu nke Yom Kippur.
Ya na enyi ya nwanyị onye Israel bụ Bar Rashti anọwo na mmekọrịta kemgbe 2020, mgbe ọnwa atọ kewara, ha alaghachila ibe ha kemgbe June 2022.
Abada mere mpụta nke mbụ ya maka Maccabi Petah Tikva na Israel State Cup na 22 Ọgost 2019, megide Hakoah Amidar Ramat Gan, nke mechara dị ka mmeri n'ụlọ.

N'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2021, otu egwuregwu Scottish Premiership bụ Celtic kwupụtara mbinye aka nke Abada na nkwekọrịta afọ ise, maka ego a kọrọ na ọ bụ nde pound atọ na pụkụ narị pound isii. N'abalị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Julaị, ọ gbara bọọlụ wee nye goolu na mpụta nke mbụ ya n'egwuregwu nke abụọ nke Celtic's Champions League megide klọb Danish FC Midtjylland
N'egwuregwu nke atọ ya na Scottish Premiership, o nyekwara goolu abụọ mbụ ya na league maka klọb ahụ megide St
Ọ na-egwuri egwu maka otu Israel's U-21 kemgbe 2020.

Abada mere ngosiputa nke mbụ ya maka ndị otu mba Israel na 5 June 2021, na egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide Montenegro, ebe ọ nọchiri Yonas Malede na nkeji nke ịrị isii na otu; egwuregwu ahụ bu nke Israel jị goolu atọ asatara naanị otu wee merie. O nyere goolu mbụ ya dị elu megide ndị otu mba Iceland n'oge egwuregwu UEFA Nations League nke 2022 na 2 June 2022, nke otu abụọ ahụ nyere goolu abụọ.
